# Leprosy
## Overview
**Type:** disease, contact, inhaled, or injury

**Save:** Fortitude DC 12 negates, Fortitude DC 20 to avoid effects

**Onset:** 2d4 weeks

**Frequency:** 1/week

**Effect:** 1d2 Cha damage

**Cure:** 2 consecutive saves
